formalParameter.description: Working directory
Path to java.
Absolute path to Clover.jar. Default value assumes Clover Command Line Tools are loaded in the system path.
Path of the directory where the source files to be instrumented are located.
Directory where Clover should place the instrumented sources. Note that files will be overwritten in the destination directory.
Clover initstring. This is the full path to the dbfile that will be used to construct/update to store coverage data.
Enables extra verbosity
Generates report even if it is no coverage info.
Compile command-line used for compilation of instrumented source files. Ant or javac is recommended.
Additional commands to be entered for CloverInstr
String containing the command-line for invoking the tests.
Enables the merging of existing Clover databases to allow combined reports to be generated.
If specified, any existing database specified by -i will be included in the merge. If interval is specified, it is used as the span when reading the existing database.
Additional commands to be entered for CloverMerge
Type of Report to Generate
Filename of the output report
Working directory
Absolute path to java.exe
Classpath to be entered

Clover Merge's Main Class
Clover initstring. This is the path where the new merged database will be written.
Enables extra verbosity
If specified, any existing database specified by -i will be included in the merge. If interval is specified, it is used as the span when reading the existing database.

Database files to merge
